item.description:
Cost: $10 per person - great price, can't beat it!
(golf club rentals - $8)


Everyone welcome!!

We've completed our golf clinic, now let's keep up the momentum and put what we've learned into play. Let's meet for 9 holes and get in as many as we can before dark and maybe get a bite or a beer at the clubhouse afterwards.

Hope to see you there!!

Note:

•T times will be staggered every 10 minutes so if you can't make right at 6, let me know in the comments section and I'll put you in a later group.


•clubs are available for rental


Weather Alternative:

Please check your email that afternoon for cancellation notification - otherwise we will play

*SSFMG and its organizers are not responsible for any injuries to participants or damage to equipment.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Directions:

group.name: The South Shore Fitness Meetup Group

item.name: Golf Anyone!! - 9 holes
